channel.title: .::How Do I Change Range Exp?::
channel.description:
Hey...I need help on changing the exp rate that you recieve when you use range, because when my players hit they get soo much exp that they almost recive 60 range and 60 hitpoints allready. I need to know how to change the exp you get for range, and for hitpoints WHEN USING RANGE.
Thanks A Lot, .::King::.

item.title: .::How Do I Change Range Exp?::
item.dc:creator: @Runescape_GFX Runescape GFX
item.description:
@Runescape_GFX wrote:

Mayhem i think thats for objects that you click that give exp…he wants to know how to change the exp rate for actually using range…

Read full topic

item.title: .::How Do I Change Range Exp?::
item.dc:creator: @Mayhem_Maker Mayhem Maker
item.description:
@Mayhem_Maker wrote:

Open up client.java,search for the object ID then I’m pretty sure if you mess around see how much xp it gives you then search that in client.java…

Read full topic

item.title: .::How Do I Change Range Exp?::
item.dc:creator: @Patrickftw Patrickftw
item.description:
@Patrickftw wrote:

Hm…I can’t remember right, but I think it’s either RhitNPC, or you could search hitdiff * or * hitdiff…O.o Different with certain sources.

Read full topic
